channel.title: [562] simple commands needed [562]
channel.description: Okay these are a few commands that i am either missing, or don't work for my 562, would be really helpful for someone to post there command! 1- ipban username -admin only 2- teleall -admin only 3- checkbank username -admin only 4- clearbank username -admin only 5- this isn't a command, just need the code for a working 562 economy reset. 6- ::food (gives 10k shark) 7- ::rules (with 10 " " areas for me to add rules, or just edit) 8- update (amount of seconds) -admin only or any other snippets that someone could please post that would be useful. I HAVE IN FACT USED THE SEARCH BAR, AND LOOKED IN TUTORIALS SECTIONS AND COULD NOT FIND THESE! SO DON'T FLAME!!! :cool: --the admin only means that it is only for the commands used by admins when they press the button under esc, "`".

item.title: [562] simple commands needed [562]
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

Okay these are a few commands that i am either missing, or don’t work for my 562, would be really helpful for someone to post there command!
1- ipban username -admin only
2- teleall -admin only
3- checkbank username -admin only
4- clearbank username -admin only
5- this isn’t a command, just need the code for a working 562 economy reset.
6- ::food (gives 10k shark)
7- ::rules (with 10 " " areas for me to add rules, or just edit)
8- update (amount of seconds) -admin only
or any other snippets that someone could please post that would be useful.
I HAVE IN FACT USED THE SEARCH BAR, AND LOOKED IN TUTORIALS SECTIONS AND COULD NOT FIND THESE! SO DON’T FLAME!!!
–the admin only means that it is only for the commands used by admins when they press the button under esc, “`”.

Read full topic
